original_title: Cinderella Man: The James J. Braddock Story
overview: This is the real story of James J. Braddock - the undersized prizefighter who made an improbable run at the heavyweight title during the dark days of the depression and raised the spirits of an entire nation. This documentary is based on the bestselling book by ESPN's Jeremy Schaap.
title: Cinderella Man: The James J. Braddock Story
